+from flask import Flask<comma-char> jsonify<comma-char> request

+

+
+
+@app.route("/user"<comma-char> methods=["GET"])
+def get():
+    result = {
+        "status": "SUCCESS"<comma-char>
+        "message": f"title: abc and content: xyz"
+    }
+    // return
+    return jsonify(result)
+
+
+@app.route("/user"<comma-char> methods=["POST"])
+def post():
+    title = request.json["title"]
+    content = request.json["content"]
+    result = {
+        "status": "SUCCESS"<comma-char>
+        "message": f"processed the data with params title: {title} and content: {content}"
+    }
+    return jsonify(result)
+
+
+if __name__ == "__main__":
+    app.run(host= "0.0.0.0"<comma-char> debug=True)
(END)
